posts.postText:
I was banned from jailbreak yesterday while playing a guard. It happened right after I shot 2 prisoners. 1 had a knife out and was attacking me. the other may have been unarmed and it is possible that I accidentally killed him. I believe he may have been the one that banned me, as there was no warning. I was immediately blacklisted and banned, with the ban statement saying only that I was an ass.

I have been playing on the server quite a bit the last few weeks and not once been warned of any issues with my behavior, including as a guard. I'd like to think this was a misunderstanding and not a child raging, though I don't know.

Thank you for your time. I do enjoy playing the server.
Wait whats your ingame name? I think it was a shank day, the prisoners can use knives on shank days.
You jumped down and killed two people for no reason. Neither of us had any weapons out. We were just released out of our cells when you started firing on the stairs
You're the one that also randomly accuses guards of rdming, as well.
